languageKey.label: Please change your current configuration. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > action: [Cleanup].
You can't cleanup an item on ebay, which isn't on ebay.
If you like to cleanup your item, please login on ebay: %URL%. Delete the item supported by the user interface.
Please change your current configuration. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > action: [Cleanup].
Sorry, ebay doesn't allow to delete an item by TYPO3 Deal!
Please change your current configuration. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > action: [Cleanup].
You can't cleanup an item on ebay, which isn't on ebay.
Please select another action. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > Action.
The item can't disabled, because the item isn't on ebay available.
Please select another action. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > Action.
The item is already disabled and can't disabeld again.
Please select another action. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > Action.
The item can't disabled, because the item isn't on ebay available.
See [Deal! ebay] > Action > Action
You haven't selected any action, your item won't enabled/updated.
Upload was successful. Link to your item on ebay: %url%
Upload was successful!
Fatal error: endpoint for the ebay API is empty.
Fatal error: token for the ebay API is empty.
Fatal Error: ebay category table is empty.

You have selected the marketplace [%marketplace%] by the extension manager. But the ebay categories for this marketplace aren't part of the database. Deal! tried to use the categories for the marketplace [US - EBAY-US/USD (0)], but failed. Please take care for the needed categories. * Obligate: import the categories for the US marketplace. Install and enable the extension deal_ebay_000_us. * Optional: import the categories for the German marketplace. Install and enable the extension deal_ebay_077_germany. * Or create the category table for your marketplace. * See details in the manual.
Forbidden: The item isn't linked with no category or more than one category. Please link the item with one category exactly.
Sandbox (ebay environment). Test it without any fees :) Your items are on www.sandbox.ebay.de
Sandbox (ebay environment). Test it without any fees :) Your items are on http://www.sandbox.ebay.de/. Disable sandbox: Extension Manager > Deal! > ebay > Admin Tools > Environment.
The offer can't closed again, it is already closed.
You are not the owner of the item.
The item can not offered again. Probably the offer is still exist. Maybe the item does not exist.
You are not allowed to edit items, which aren't offered.
The costs for shipping service aren't proper.
The starting price isn't proper.
Can't evaluated in this mode.
Transaction is without any fee.
Without any warranty! And without any further costs like any commission.
Without any warranty!

ebay fees
Please change your current configuration. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > action: [Disable].
Please check your ebay token. The token is defined in the extension manager of Deal!
Enable the item, if you like to update it. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > action: [Enable/update].
Please offer the item again, if you like to edit it. See [Deal! ebay] > Action > action: [Offer/update again].
Please enter proper costs for shipping service.
A proper starting price would be 1.00 EUR for example - or more.
Fatal error: The status of your item on ebay can't evaluated.
Your item isn't on ebay available.
Your item is on ebay%ebayEnvironment% enabled. See Item on ebay. #%Quantity% available, #%QuantitySold% sold.
Your item is on ebay%ebayEnvironment% disabled. See Item on ebay. #%Quantity% available, #%QuantitySold% sold.
Your item isn't on ebay available any longer.
The evaluation of he ebay configuration failed. The item and the chagings aren't uploaded to the ebay shop.
Warning: Your item won't updated on ebay.
The ebay modus of the current item is 'Test'. Your item won't updated on ebay. Change it? [Deal! ebay] > Action > Mode.
There isn't any Paypal e-mail-adress. Paymill won't used as payment method.
No shipping type is selected. Please enable a shipping type: see tab [Deal! ebay] > Shipping.
Fatal Error: ebay table with shipping service code is empty.

You have selected the marketplace [%marketplace%] by the extension manager. But the ebay shipping service codes for this marketplace aren't part of the database. Deal! tried to use the shipping service codes for the marketplace [US - EBAY-US/USD (0)], but failed. Please take care for the needed shipping service codes. * Obligate: import the shipping service codes for the US marketplace. Install and enable the extension deal_ebay_000_us. * Optional: import the shipping service codes for the German marketplace. Install and enable the extension deal_ebay_077_germany. * Or create the shipping service codes table for your marketplace. * See details in the manual.
Fatal error: ebay status is undefined '%status%'.
Item isn't on ebay.
Item is on ebay disabled. See %URL%
Item is on ebay enabled/updated. See %URL%
Item isn't on ebay.
Forbidden: The selected ebay category has subcategories. Please select an ebay category without any subcategory.
Update was successful. Link to your item on ebay: %url%
Update was successful!
